selections.name: Queen Maker
selections.reason: Put in a solid debut effort finishing 2nd of 12, beaten less than a length. With natural improvement and a good draw, she sets the standard here.

selections.name: Fast Wind
selections.reason: Also ran 2nd on debut, beaten 1.75 lengths. Showed good early speed and should be right in the mix again.

selections.name: I Am Queen
selections.reason: Finished 4th on debut, not far behind the top selections. Open to improvement.

selections.name: Dubai Seonmul
selections.reason: Runner-up on debut and draws the inside rail. Must be respected.

danger_horse.name: Fast Wind
danger_horse.reason: Very similar debut profile to the top pick and could easily turn the tables.

selections.name: Queen's Today
selections.reason: In a very weak field, her 6th place finish last start is one of the better recent form lines. Should go close.

selections.name: Powerful Thunder
selections.reason: Showed some ability in trials and debut. The wide draw is a concern but the field is shallow.

selections.name: Man Of The Day
selections.reason: Debutant who doesn't need to be a superstar to contend in this company. Watch betting.

selections.name: Airforce Captain
selections.reason: First starter who trialed reasonably well. Can figure.

danger_horse.name: Powerful Thunder
danger_horse.reason: Market support suggests ability despite the raw form.

selections.name: Like Dragon
selections.reason: Consistent recent form with a 3rd and 4th. Looks the most reliable option in this field.

selections.name: Hwaryeohan Sungan
selections.reason: Has been competitive in similar races. Should be running on late.

selections.name: Dokki Tiger
selections.reason: Disappointed last start but debut effort was promising. Can bounce back.

selections.name: Wonderful Wind
selections.reason: Improved to finish 4th last time out. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Hwaryeohan Sungan
danger_horse.reason: Capable of hitting the board if the pace suits.

selections.name: Momentum
selections.reason: Destroyed the field by 16 lengths last start. A repeat of that performance wins this easily.

selections.name: Youngyoung Bravo
selections.reason: Also coming off a dominant 6-length win. The main danger to the top pick.

selections.name: Boryeongui Sinyong
selections.reason: Consistent type who won two starts back. Solid place prospect.

selections.name: Unlimited Run
selections.reason: Finished 3rd last start. Can fill the minor placings.

danger_horse.name: Youngyoung Bravo
danger_horse.reason: Impressive last start winner who could challenge if the top pick regresses.

selections.name: Janggo Man
selections.reason: Won well on debut. Has to overcome the wide draw but looks to have plenty of upside.

selections.name: Pistol Cut
selections.reason: In great form with a win and a 2nd in last two starts. Hard to beat.

selections.name: Miss Sniper
selections.reason: Consistent filly who has placed in her last two. Must be included.

selections.name: Crystal Mulgyeol
selections.reason: Ran a solid 3rd last time out. Good draw.

danger_horse.name: Pistol Cut
danger_horse.reason: Proven performer at this level and will make the top pick earn it.

selections.name: Black Tree
selections.reason: Coming off a strong 2nd place finish. Looks ready to win at this distance.

selections.name: Fantastic Eagle
selections.reason: Consistent type who is usually around the mark. The favorite for a reason.

selections.name: Flying Champion
selections.reason: Finished 4th last start and has placed at this level before.

selections.name: Encore
selections.reason: Ran 3rd last time out. Drawn well to get a soft run.

danger_horse.name: Fantastic Eagle
danger_horse.reason: Reliable and will be right there at the finish.

selections.name: Fantastic Force
selections.reason: Has been knocking on the door with a 2nd and 3rd recently. Looks the one to beat.

selections.name: Amazing World
selections.reason: Improved effort to finish 2nd last start. Major threat.

selections.name: Black Volt
selections.reason: Veteran who ran a good 2nd last time. Can figure in the finish.

selections.name: Flying Crown
selections.reason: Consistent performer who rarely runs a bad race.

danger_horse.name: Amazing World
danger_horse.reason: Showed enough last start to suggest a win is near.

selections.name: Beolgyo Masulsa
selections.reason: Winner last start at this track. Progressive type who handles the distance well.

selections.name: Yeosu Super Star
selections.reason: Also a last start winner, beating a key rival here. Must be respected.

selections.name: Triple Sinhwa
selections.reason: Finished 2nd to Yeosu Super Star last time. Consistent and will be in the mix.

selections.name: Daeho Nara
selections.reason: Ran 3rd in the same race as the selections above. Solid place chance.

danger_horse.name: Yeosu Super Star
danger_horse.reason: Proven winner at the trip and form lines stack up well.

selections.name: Eunbit Daero
selections.reason: Finished 3rd last start and has won 4 of 11 career starts. Classy runner.

selections.name: Heuimang Garam
selections.reason: Coming off a good 2nd place finish. Drawn the rail and is the main danger.

selections.name: Open Sky
selections.reason: Has won 3 of 10. Failed last start but previous form was excellent.

selections.name: Golden
selections.reason: Experienced campaigner. Can sneak into the minor money.

danger_horse.name: Heuimang Garam
danger_horse.reason: Recent form is strong and gets the perfect run from barrier 1.
